Interface ICameraView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CameraSurfaceView, CameraTextureView, DummyCameraView

    public interface ICameraView
    Created by dodo on 17/11/14.

      Sets the camera preview rotation to be applied.

        Parameters:

      • getVisibleWidth

        int getVisibleWidth()
        Returns the actual width of the visible part of camera view. Can be less than actual view width (in case of ASPECT_FILL mode)
        Returns:
        the actual width of the visible part of camera view.

      • getVisibleHeight

        int getVisibleHeight()
        Returns the actual height of the visible part of camera view. Can be less than actual view height (in case of ASPECT_FILL mode)
        Returns:
        the actual height of the visible part of camera view.
